title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Monitor APU Airbus A320
description:
Probably you have been in the scenario where you started to A320 and waited for ages until the APU was changing to available. Well I have been in that same scenario and in this video I will show you how you can monitor to start progress of the APU. In this video I am using the A320NX mod.
